      static double[] normalizeDistr1D(int[] tab)

      static double[][] normalizeDistr2D(int[][] tab)
      Normalizes values of amount to probability per each row ---tab--------tabNorm [0][0]=2-----[0][0]=0.1 [0][1]=4-----[0][1]=0.2 [0][2]=6-----[0][2]=0.3 [0][3]=8-----[0][3]=0.4
      static double[][][] normalizeDistr3D(int[][][] tab)
      Normalizes values of amount to probability for 3D table ---tab--------tabNorm [0][0][0]=2-----[0][0][0]=0.1 [0][0][1]=4-----[0][0][1]=0.2 [0][0][2]=6-----[0][0][2]=0.3 [0][0][3]=8-----[0][0][3]=0.4

    • Method Detail

      • sumDBm

        static float sumDBm(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> dBms)
        Sum values of power in dBm. It is logarithmic scale, so you need to change dBms into mW - sum values - change to dBms once again. 10dBm+10dBm=13dBm - 10mW+10mW=20mW=13dBm 20dBm=100mW
        Parameters:
        dBms -
        Returns:

      • subDBm

        static float subDBm(float sumdBm,
                    float sub)
        Subtraction of 2 dBm values

      • normalizeDistr1D

        public static double[] normalizeDistr1D(int[] tab)
        Normalizes amounts to probabilities e.g: -tab------tabNorm [0]=2-----[0]=0.1 [1]=4-----[1]=0.2 [2]=6-----[2]=0.3 [3]=8-----[3]=0.4
        Parameters:
        tab - array with amounts
        Returns:
        array with normalized probabilities

      • normalizeDistr2D

        public static double[][] normalizeDistr2D(int[][] tab)
        Normalizes values of amount to probability per each row ---tab--------tabNorm [0][0]=2-----[0][0]=0.1 [0][1]=4-----[0][1]=0.2 [0][2]=6-----[0][2]=0.3 [0][3]=8-----[0][3]=0.4
        Parameters:
        tab - 2D array with amounts
        Returns:
        2D array with normalized probabilities

      • normalizeDistr3D

        public static double[][][] normalizeDistr3D(int[][][] tab)
        Normalizes values of amount to probability for 3D table ---tab--------tabNorm [0][0][0]=2-----[0][0][0]=0.1 [0][0][1]=4-----[0][0][1]=0.2 [0][0][2]=6-----[0][0][2]=0.3 [0][0][3]=8-----[0][0][3]=0.4
        Parameters:
        tab - 2D array with amounts
        Returns:
        2D array with normalized probabilities
